fields.text: Thank you for calling Plaid in San Francisco, where we enable your applications to connect seamlessly with users’ bank accounts.
For sales and partnership inquiries, press [INDEX].
For new product demos and pricing information, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you with our sales team for demo and pricing details.
For existing partnership account management, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we transfer you to our partner account management team.
For developer and technical support, press [INDEX].
One moment please while we connect you to our API support engineers.
For security and compliance inquiries, press [INDEX].
One moment please while we transfer you to our security and compliance specialists.
